Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Should the character limit be 
increased??? 

  o Yes, until 8 characters would be fine  
  o Yes, until 16 character would be fine  
  o Yes, Unlimited character would be fine 
  o No, the current limit it's fine 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=956168  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
